StudiogeniX

Providing cutting-edge digital solutions engineered towards your business growth and excellence

My Story

Studiogenix is a web design/development and digital marketing business I started with the goal of providing outstandingly phenomenal digital solutions to businesses in need of brand awareness and online visibility that brings in more customers, or getting online sales through the roof.

I actually got into the web development industries due to my immense love for building and designing beautiful things. I started my journey as a web designer/developer in 2016, and since then I never looked back or regretted my decision switching from software testing.

My enthusiasm for all things digital and tech is what motivates me everyday to learn new and exciting things, which I later apply to my valued client's work. Client's satisfaction after a project is completed is what I am always gunning for everytime, which is why I dedicate my free time to studying new things and the people I work with bring this same kind of passion into their work too to make sure you are provided with one of the best services yet which gives you a huge competitive advantage over your competition.

When I am not studying the latest technology to keep me on my toes, then you can catch me watching movies, listening to music, hanging out with friends or coding.

In near future, my dream is to explore the exciting field of artificial intelligence and mobile development.

Why Chose StudiogeniX?

You might wondering after what has been said, what precisely do you stand to gain. Not sure of how it will impact your ROI. Still not sure whether you should move forward. That's perfectly okay. Here's what to anticipate when you work with StudiogeniX.

Unrelenting Customer Support

Customers are not just left on their own after the completion of a project. We ensure things web hosting,maintenance and support is taken of for customers.

Optimized & Mobile-Friendly Design

A full on-page SEO audits is carried out on the completed website and a mobile resposive design is created and implemented to help improve your position in all the major search engines to increase visibility.

Start-Up Inclined

We always make sure that a lot of attention is given to new enterprises or businesses as a way to help the business grow. We offer valuable informations to new business owners that can help their business thrive.

Complete Transparency

Clients are included in every phase of the solution product development to give them a deep understanding of what is happening behind the scenes.
